lines.text: Now listen, Apollo, you're so excited, you don't know what you're talking about! Was it a corpse?
I don't know. I took one peep and flew!
Barney, if you're still sheriff after next election, it won't be on my vote!
Matt, the way I figure, you won't have any vote next election.

[to the telegrapher]
I'm going to give you some advice, mister. If you wanna get rich, stay away from women. I know from experience.

[to Nancy]
Now, look, will you cut the bubble gum talk and give?
Why are there potatoes on the floor?
I put them there, that's how I cook potatoes, on the floor.
Ted, there are times when parents must be disobeyed...

[referring to their car]
Turn it around! A wise general always leaves the road open for retreat. Don't you know that?
